I am Economist. My fields of specialization are Industrial Organization, Regulation, and Antitrust. I have a PhD in Economics by the [Universidad de San Andrés](https://www.udesa.edu.ar/departamento-de-economia/economia), Argentina.

I am mainly at [dECON](http://cienciassociales.edu.uy/departamentodeeconomia/leandro-zipitria-2/) at the Universidad de la República, but also teach at [Universidad de Montevideo](http://fcee.um.edu.uy/profesoresum/2446-leandro-zipitria/).

My full CV is available in [English](files/english_CV_2019-04.pdf) and [Spanish](files/spanish_CV_2019-04.pdf).
